meanings.definition: The state or quality of being an old man.
meanings.sent1: In his geezerhood, Grandpa enjoyed telling stories to his grandchildren.
meanings.sent2: Many people look forward to reaching geezerhood and retiring.
meanings.sent3: At the retirement party, everyone teased Grandpa about officially entering geezerhood.
meanings.sent4: The geezerhood of the ancient oak tree was evident in its gnarled branches.
meanings.sent5: The town celebrated the oldest resident's geezerhood with a special ceremony.

meanings.definition: The period of time in which a man is old.
meanings.sent1: During his geezerhood, he spent his days fishing by the lake.
meanings.sent2: Geezerhood often comes with wisdom and experience.
meanings.sent3: The family joked about Dad's geezerhood when he struggled with technology.
meanings.sent4: The geezerhood of the neighborhood watch captain made him a respected figure.
meanings.sent5: The film portrayed the protagonist's geezerhood as a time of reflection and growth.
